WRITING.TITLE: Tips to remember to do RC throughout the day
WRITING.TEXT:
I am really dedicated to learn how to have lucid dreams regularly, but I keep forgetting to do reality checks during the day.
Does anyone have tips to remind yourself to do reality checks?
If we even reach 150 years. It would not surprise me if humanity would go extinct in less than 50 years, so enjoy every day is my advice!
Here in Holland we have something called 'Spacecake'. It is sort of a cake with a funny taste. It contains weed and a single slice can make you very high ;)
Wind. I bike to school and for some reason it seems like I always have headwind...
Wtf, why would you do this??
